2021 Schacres Lake Pricing:

Pay per set $55.00
10 set punchcard $500.00

Memberships:
- Single Preferred $400.00 upfront, $35.00 per set
- Single All Access $2,200.00 (max 3 sets/day)
- Family All Access $4,800.00 (max 6 sets/day)
